level.heading: When official removed; filling of vacancies.
level.text: An elected official is removed from office if a majority of the qualified electors voting in the election vote to remove him or her. The vacancy created by such recall shall be filled in the same manner as other vacancies as provided in §§ 1-204.01(d) and 1-204.21(c)(2) and § 1-1001.10(a).

level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-46, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-204.101.
